author: paulhauner
content: I'm not seeing many aggregates.. last epoch I only observed 8 aggregators, the epoch before that only 1 aggregator

author: paulhauner
content: I'm not rejecting any either, 100% success rate of processing

author: paulhauner
content: hmm this is probably an artifact of a having a low validator count but mainnet-spec `TARGET_AGGREGATORS_PER_COMMITTEE` and `TARGET_COMMITTEE_SIZE`

author: paulhauner
content:
at the moment we maintain two separate pools:

- naive aggregation pool: only contains unaggregated attestations (i.e., from shard subnets)
- block inclusion pool: only contains aggregated attestations (i.e., from the global subnet)

If we don't get an aggregate then we don't attempt to produce one from naive aggregation pool

author: paulhauner
content: We plan to fix this in the future.. for profit maximization, but it's not a priority at the moment.

author: paulhauner
content: So, keen to keep an eye on it whilst the validator numbers increase. With the current active validator count of 30 and the spec constants set as they are, we're unlikely to see many aggregators.
